Uses of Package
org.mobicents.slee.container.deployment.jboss

Packages that use org.mobicents.slee.container.deployment.jboss
org.mobicents.slee.container.deployment.jboss   
org.mobicents.slee.container.management.jmx   
 

Classes in org.mobicents.slee.container.deployment.jboss used by org.mobicents.slee.container.deployment.jboss
DeployableComponent
          This class represents a SLEE Deployable Component such as a Profile Specification, Event Type Definition, RA Type, Resource Adaptor, SBB or Service.
DeployableUnit
          This class represents a SLEE Deployable Unit, represented by a collection of Deployable Components.
DeployableUnitWrapper
          DeployableUnit Wrapper for providing some useful URL manipulation and VFS hacks.
DeploymentManager
          This class represents the Manager responsible for executing deployment actions and for controlling dependencies and monitoring new deployments using the deployer.
DeploymentManagerMBean
           
SleeContainerDeployerImpl
          The SLEE module responsible for persistent deployments.
SLEEDeployerEntityResolver
          Entity Resolver for JAIN SLEE DTDs used by Deployer
SLEEDeploymentMetaData
          JAIN SLEE Deployable Unit MetaData for JBoss AS 5.x Deployers
SLEEDeploymentMetaData.ComponentType
           
SLEESubDeployer
          This is the Deployer main class where the AS will invoke the lifecycle methods for new deployments.
SLEESubDeployerMBean
          Simple MBean for obtaining current deployer status which will show what's deployed and what's on the waiting list for deployment and undeployment.
 

Classes in org.mobicents.slee.container.deployment.jboss used by org.mobicents.slee.container.management.jmx
SleeContainerDeployerImpl
          The SLEE module responsible for persistent deployments.
